parameters: "The kids are in the room to the left, We have to collect 2 dreams to open the door."
"We've also unlock \"SuperBomb\" dash, its cost more pixie dust but creates a larger explosion."
"press 2 to use superbomb and 1 to go back to the normal dash."
"By the way, You can pause the game with the esc key."
"But, don't get comfy, it's only getting harder from here."
